title: No Escape Room
short_cast: Jeni Ross, Mark Ghanimé, Hamza Haq, Kathyrn Davis, Dennis Andres, Brianna Barnes
cast: Jeni Ross, Mark Ghanimé, Hamza Haq, Kathyrn Davis, Dennis Andres, Brianna Barnes
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A lighthearted bonding opportunity takes a dark and decidedly dangerous turn when a father and daughter try out an escape room in a small town.
